name: Todd Howard Is Going To Be Late
name_original: Todd Howard Is Going To Be Late
description:
This is the first game I ever made. Its dumb, its short, and its simple because I made it for a uni assignment after I lost my actual project. Maybe someday I'll make that game but until then marvel at this garbage fire.

For reference the environment is a 3D modelled replica of my bedroom that I made for another assignment, right down to the knicknacks, I deleted the bed so you can actually walk around, stuck in some objectives and peppered a few memes about the place.

Bon appetit!
